short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FPT Can Tho - IAP491 - Capstone Project. Blocking malicious URL. Children Protection: prevent access 18+ content on web browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summary of main features:
- Block malicious websites with blacklist and whitelist.
- Scan the current website with Virus Total and show the safety of that website.
- Allows to personalize the pages users want to block or allow access
- Manage children with a separate blacklist, and can set a password for security.
- When the children feature is enabled, block websites we consider to have adult content.
- Identify and remove Iframe on the current Website.
